room_title: Escape room "The Asylum" by Trapped DownRiver in Detroit
room_description:
A safe and tranquil place for troubled children suffering from mental and psychiatric issues, the Asylum was Dr. Brodmann's special project. Until the children found out about the truth. Rumor has it, after unspeakable acts, the facility was immediately sealed... even trapping some employees inside.
The facility has recently gained attention from reports of lights, sounds and even screams coming from the building. Your mission is to investigate the reports of lifelike ghosts said to be haunting this location.
